pkgmetadata.longdescription: Solving Ax = b Nimbly in C++ // Routines for solving large systems of linear equations and eigenproblems in R. Direct and iterative solvers from the Eigen C++ library are made available. Solvers include Cholesky, LU, QR, and Krylov subspace methods (Conjugate Gradient, BiCGSTAB). Dense and sparse problems are supported.
